A0: The Virginia State Police Bureau of
RelatedSentence: The Virginia State Police Bureau of Criminal Investigation 's Police Shooting Investigative Team out of the Wytheville Field Office is investigating the incident .
According to a news release , the Pearisburg police officer initiated a traffic stop about 3 p.m. During the course of the stop , the driver was shot .
The Giles County Sheriff 's Office is also reportedly investigating the incident .
Officials did not release the names of the officer and driver .
